Auckland ‘pork’ tagger’s video of vandalism above motorway traffic https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-pork-taggers-video-of-vandalism-above-motorway-traffic/P7QKMRI3QFGLND435A3LFG737M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-pork-taggers-video-of-vandalism-above-motorway-traffic/P7QKMRI3QFGLND435A3LFG737M/ Raphael FranksFootage shows two people running across a lane of motorway traffic before tagging signs.
